velocity_control_example.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 import PandaController as panda
4 import numpy as np
5 import rospy
6 import tf2_ros
7 
8 VMAX = .1
9 FREQUENCY = 50.
10 PERIOD = 1. / FREQUENCY
11 
12 if __name__ == '__main__':
13 
14  points = np.array([[.6, .5, .5],
15  [.6, .5, 1],
16  [.6, 1, 1],
17  [.6, 1, .5]])
18 
19  pc = panda.PandaController()
20 
21  tfBuffer = tf2_ros.Buffer()
22  listener = tf2_ros.TransformListener(tfBuffer)
23 
24  rate = rospy.Rate(FREQUENCY)
25 
26  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
27  try:
28  transformation = tfBuffer.lookup_transform('panda_link8', 'world', rospy.Time())
29  translation = transformation.transform.translation
30  # Current position vector
31  vector_0_EE = np.array([translation.x, translation.y, translation.z])
32  # Desired position vector
33  vector_0_EE_d = points[0,:]
34  # Error vector
35  vector_error = vector_0_EE_d - vector_0_EE
36  vector_error_unit = vector_error / np.linalg.norm(vector_error)
37 
38  pc.publish_velocities(VMAX * vector_error_unit,PERIOD)
39 
40 
41  except (tf2_ros.LookupException, tf2_ros.ConnectivityException, tf2_ros.ExtrapolationException):
42  rate.sleep()
43  continue
